Detailed Description

Load DLL's using an object, in a system-independent fashion.

DLL's are often painful to use, especially in a cross-platform manner. This code supports the dl API under UNIX and the windows DLL API.

It allows users to conjure up DLL code and retrieve functions from that library. For more information, see the CodingWithDLLsGuide
